data.question: What is the BET surface area of BPV-MOF?
What is the percentage of Ir-loading with respect to Zr centers in mBPV-MOF-Ir?
What is the conversion percentage of the product when mPT-MOF-Ir is used for ortho-silylation of diethyl(hydrido)silyl ether (2g)?
Does the color of TPHN-MOF change after being treated with [Ir(COD)(OMe)]2 in THF?
data.answer: No, the color does not change.

data.question: What is the yield of 5-(4,4,5,5-tetramethyl-1,3,2-dioxaborolan-2-yl)-m-xylene when mBPV-MOF-Ir is used for C-H borylation of m-xylene?
Can mPT-MOF-Ir catalyze the tandem dehydrocoupling of N-methylbenzyl amines to azasilolanes?
What is the conversion percentage for the borylation of m-xylene using mPT-MOF-Ir under identical conditions compared to {pth}Ir(COD)(OMe)?
data.answer: mPT-MOF-Ir shows a higher conversion percentage.

data.question: Is the mPT-MOF-Ir catalyst heterogeneous in nature for the C-H silylation of arenes?
What is the BET surface area of mPT-MOF?
What is the yield of 2-(4,4,5,5-tetramethyl-1,3,2-dioxaborolan-2-yl)-1H-indole when mBPV-MOF-Ir is used for C-H borylation of indole?
Can TPHN-MOF treated with [Ir(COD)(OMe)]2 catalyze the C-H borylation of benzene?
What is the conversion percentage for the borylation of arenes using mBPV-MOF-Ir compared to mPT-MOF-Ir?
data.answer: mBPV-MOF-Ir shows a similar or slightly higher conversion percentage.

data.question: Is the mBPV-MOF-Ir catalyst heterogeneous in nature for the C-H borylation of arenes?
